at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common

Class TriggeringAdapterConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.TriggeringAdapterConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterConfiguration

    public class TriggeringAdapterConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdapterConfiguration
    A triggering adapter toggle between the two output values "lowerOutput" and "upperOutput". The upper and the lower input threshold values ("lowerThreshold" and "upperThreshold") and the output values are configuration items.

    If "upperThreshold" is lower than the "lowerThreshold", this adapter works as comparator. The input value is compared against "lowerThreshold" and the configuration item "upperThreshold" is ignored.

    "upperOutput" may be smaller than "lowerOutput". In this way an inverting trigger is configured.
